name: B. Water Lily
statement:
While sailing on a boat, Inessa noticed a beautiful water lily flower
above the lake’s surface. She came closer and it turned out that the
lily was exactly H centimeters above the water surface. Inessa grabbed
the flower and sailed the distance of L centimeters. Exactly at this
point the flower touched the water surface. Suppose that the lily grows
at some point A on the lake bottom, and its stem is always a straight
segment with one endpoint at point A. Also suppose that initially the
flower was exactly above the point A, i.e. its stem was vertical. Can
you determine the depth of the lake at point A?
